reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: "The project ""Awareness and prevention of HIV + AIDS among vulnerable groups (FSWs, eunuchs and Youths)"" has been designed for awareness and prevention of HIV+AIDS among these groups in Red light Area Lahore, Iqbal Town Lahore and Sargodha. The goal of t he project is to create an enabling environment for empowerment of vulnerable groups for protected sex and improved health-seeking behaviour leading to prevention of HIV+ AIDS among sex workers, youths and eunuchs. The objectives of the project is to promo te the conditions that encourages sex workers, eunuchs and youths particularly the clients of sex workers to take steps to protect themselves from STIs and HIV infections and to provide affordable and accessible health facilities especially for female sex workers + their family members, eunuchs and youths with focus on reproductive health, STIs management and primary health care."
